properties.name: camel.component.aws2-ses.access-key
properties.description: Amazon AWS Access Key

properties.name: camel.component.aws2-ses.amazon-s-e-s-client
properties.description: To use the AmazonSimpleEmailService as the client. The option is a software.amazon.awssdk.services.ses.SesClient type.

properties.name: camel.component.aws2-ses.autowired-enabled
properties.description: Whether autowiring is enabled. This is used for automatic autowiring options (the option must be marked as autowired) by looking up in the registry to find if there is a single instance of matching type, which then gets configured on the component. This can be used for automatic configuring JDBC data sources, JMS connection factories, AWS Clients, etc.

properties.name: camel.component.aws2-ses.bcc
properties.description: List of comma separated destination blind carbon copy (bcc) email address. Can be overridden with 'CamelAwsSesBcc' header.

properties.name: camel.component.aws2-ses.cc
properties.description: List of comma separated destination carbon copy (cc) email address. Can be overridden with 'CamelAwsSesCc' header.

properties.name: camel.component.aws2-ses.configuration
properties.description: component configuration. The option is a org.apache.camel.component.aws2.ses.Ses2Configuration type.

properties.name: camel.component.aws2-ses.configuration-set
properties.description: Set the configuration set to send with every request. Override it with 'CamelAwsSesConfigurationSet' header.

properties.name: camel.component.aws2-ses.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable auto configuration of the aws2-ses component. This is enabled by default.

properties.name: camel.component.aws2-ses.health-check-consumer-enabled
properties.description: Used for enabling or disabling all consumer based health checks from this component

properties.name: camel.component.aws2-ses.health-check-producer-enabled
properties.description: Used for enabling or disabling all producer based health checks from this component. Notice: Camel has by default disabled all producer based health-checks. You can turn on producer checks globally by setting camel.health.producersEnabled=true.

properties.name: camel.component.aws2-ses.lazy-start-producer
properties.description: Whether the producer should be started lazy (on the first message). By starting lazy you can use this to allow CamelContext and routes to startup in situations where a producer may otherwise fail during starting and cause the route to fail being started. By deferring this startup to be lazy then the startup failure can be handled during routing messages via Camel's routing error handlers. Beware that when the first message is processed then creating and starting the producer may take a little time and prolong the total processing time of the processing.

properties.name: camel.component.aws2-ses.override-endpoint
properties.description: Set the need for overidding the endpoint. This option needs to be used in combination with uriEndpointOverride option

properties.name: camel.component.aws2-ses.profile-credentials-name
properties.description: If using a profile credentials provider this parameter will set the profile name

properties.name: camel.component.aws2-ses.proxy-host
properties.description: To define a proxy host when instantiating the SES client

properties.name: camel.component.aws2-ses.proxy-port
properties.description: To define a proxy port when instantiating the SES client

properties.name: camel.component.aws2-ses.proxy-protocol
properties.description: To define a proxy protocol when instantiating the SES client

properties.name: camel.component.aws2-ses.region
properties.description: The region in which SES client needs to work. When using this parameter, the configuration will expect the lowercase name of the region (for example ap-east-1) You'll need to use the name Region.EU_WEST_1.id()

properties.name: camel.component.aws2-ses.reply-to-addresses
properties.description: List of comma separated reply-to email address(es) for the message, override it using 'CamelAwsSesReplyToAddresses' header.

properties.name: camel.component.aws2-ses.return-path
properties.description: The email address to which bounce notifications are to be forwarded, override it using 'CamelAwsSesReturnPath' header.

properties.name: camel.component.aws2-ses.secret-key
properties.description: Amazon AWS Secret Key

properties.name: camel.component.aws2-ses.subject
properties.description: The subject which is used if the message header 'CamelAwsSesSubject' is not present.

properties.name: camel.component.aws2-ses.to
properties.description: List of comma separated destination email address. Can be overridden with 'CamelAwsSesTo' header.

properties.name: camel.component.aws2-ses.trust-all-certificates
properties.description: If we want to trust all certificates in case of overriding the endpoint

properties.name: camel.component.aws2-ses.uri-endpoint-override
properties.description: Set the overriding uri endpoint. This option needs to be used in combination with overrideEndpoint option

properties.name: camel.component.aws2-ses.use-default-credentials-provider
properties.description: Set whether the Ses client should expect to load credentials through a default credentials provider or to expect static credentials to be passed in.

properties.name: camel.component.aws2-ses.use-profile-credentials-provider
properties.description: Set whether the SES client should expect to load credentials through a profile credentials provider.
